website_summaries.verdict: Take your recording quality from good to legendary with these studio-grade acoustic panels.
pros: These panels provide excellent low frequency isolation and echo reduction for clearer, crisper sound
Panels measure 12 inches x 12 inches and are 1-inch thick
They arrive uncompressed and are hand-inspected by the manufacturer to guarantee uniformity for recording studios, vocal booths, home theaters, and more
cons: Tiles have a strong smell out of the packages and require airing out

customer_reviews.title: They don't dampen sound.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for acoustic treatment in a home theater without results. Then while listening to music I held a piece over my ear to see how it would muffle the sound and almost nothing happened. I then passed a piece in front of a speaker and still almost nothing happened. These panels are almost acoustically transparent and hardly absorb any sound at all. You could use them as speaker grills. Sound passes right through. You need a lot denser material to absorb sound.
customer_reviews.author: A R.

customer_reviews.title: They do what they need to
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain for the great price. Panels arrived as described, the foam felt heavy duty enough for what I needed them for (recording voice tracks for animated shorts I work on). Followed the advice in the description and hung with command strips. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not for the ceiling
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to put these on the ceiling in my basement for my husband's drumset, but I'm having the hardest time getting them to stay on the ceiling. I've been using command strips and I clean the ceiling before putting on, but the foam does not stick well to the strips at all. I'm a little disappointed. I've put up about half of them, and they're not really doing anything to dampen the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Balsitis

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Use command strips when putting them up!
customer_reviews.text: All around great panels for the price. Foam was thicker than expected and I put them up in my apartment easily with command strips. I'm using the panels to listen to music in my room and it helps stop the echo. Definitely makes my speakers sound better. One of the walls in my bedroom as too bare.
customer_reviews.author: John Willard Jr

customer_reviews.title: it helps!
customer_reviews.text: so i wanted to reduce the sounds from my ham radio room to my master bedroom located directly above my room. While not completely sound proofing to the upstairs room, this did help muffle the sounds and the wife says it's now a more of white noise. I used a 3m spray adhesive to adhear to the ceiling tiles and it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: resq2piper

customer_reviews.title: These do the job and are en even color, ...
customer_reviews.text: These do the job and are en even color, but they are not all identically cut and therefore you have to be careful when installing them in order to keep a straight line. The difference on a few of them was small, but it is enough to require laying them out ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Music Heals

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These are super light weight. The ad talks to it's quality density, but there really is no density to them. I don't see them having much affect at all. They probably help reduce some reverb, but I don't think much more than just putting up a sheet or something. They will just look better doing it.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: an affordable start
customer_reviews.text: They work - albeit the pieces were a little thinner than I anticipated. The only downfall - like many other reviewers here seem to have been plagued with - all of my pieces (24 in total) had the corners cut funny. So if you're not placing these on a black backdrop you will inevitably have gaps.
customer_reviews.author: MasterBlaster

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for sound reduction.
customer_reviews.text: Very important: IT DOESN'T BLOCK SOUND! Now, there's a difference between blocking and filtering. Sound will still come out and in even if you place them all over the room, but you will notice that it won't penetrate your ears as hard outside of it, which essentially means, a quieter room.
customer_reviews.author: Elian Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: The Best Investment I've Made!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! I do a lot of video blogging, and in my home studio, was having trouble with noise quality due to the setup of the room and the sound of my kids and pets playing around the house. I had tried other products before, but these panels knock the rest out of the water! They're aesthetically pleasing, functional, and very well priced! I've noticed a significant improvement in the audio quality of my videos with fewer echoes and less noticeable background noise. I'm going to be buying more for my office, and highly recommend these panels!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Lane

customer_reviews.title: Quite a lot of work, but I was able to do it.
customer_reviews.text: Too bad they do not come with finishing tips or tricks. One edge is visible from behind my fridge and it is slightly uneven. Wish I knew how to cover up that edge.
customer_reviews.author: ESR

customer_reviews.title: They don't dampen sound very much - but I might not have installed them right
customer_reviews.text: I spent a couple hours attaching these to my walls, I opted for a less permanent installation in case they didn't work. Do they work? I honestly can't say yes or no. If they do, it's not very noticeable. Maybe I installed them wrong, or there is a more efficient way to do it. Not sure. I have about 12 sq ft of panels in a pretty small room. Oh well, they were pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: CreatiVertical LC

customer_reviews.title: Good price happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Panels came in nicely not ripped or too compressed. With a little spray adhesive and poster board I got it set up for my room and it looks pretty nice. Get a 12x12 poster board from Michael’s if you’re looking to do the same
customer_reviews.author: James Long

customer_reviews.title: Best Valued Foam On amazon
customer_reviews.text: This foam is very inexpensive It works great for any application I use it in my Home Office studio it's not Professional Grade but it does make a significant difference in the resonance of sound in a small Room.
customer_reviews.author: A.Childress -Alvis Tech Group-

customer_reviews.title: High quality and priced competitively
customer_reviews.text: Helping my sister put together the pieces of her recording studio. I’ve noticed wedge-shaped panels on the walls in other recording studios and owners say they are great at buffering out unwanted noise. In comparison to the other 1 inch thick acoustic panels available on Amazon, these offered by Emerson Bronx CHG seem to be the highest quality. The foam seems denser and thicker in the areas between the wedge peaks. No smell, which was a huge plus. The color was a consistent, rich, black color. I’m excited to get these up!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler E.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for your sanity!
customer_reviews.text: Paneled my sons room wall between our bedrooms, deadens the sound of his wiki wiki rap music and dopey gaming conversations... well worth the investment for some peace and quiet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or the trouble
customer_reviews.text: These did not dampen the sound whatsoever. In fact, they are thin and feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Made my room a great deal quieter. I used command strips to adhere to slanted wall and I has held for months no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Decent looking, but not sound deadening.
customer_reviews.text: These panels, even though cut accurately and are aesthetically appealing, do not sound deaden at all. These were to be used to reduce my low volume speech at night through an office wall, but they don't do much of anything due to their thickness or density.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to deaden the sound from outside of my apartment. Works well, not totally soundproof. Would definitely recommend for the price. Thicker than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Geller

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: These acoustic panels have provided excellent sound absorption for my home announcing studio..and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: PeterCW

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and terrible quality. They are virtually worthless
customer_reviews.text: Tiny and terrible quality. They are virtually worthless. Do not buy this product. Buy something from real foam company like auralex or ultimate acoustics. You're going to pay more but it's worth it. You might as well use egg cartons over this product. Total crap. I gave mine away for free
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There to thin
customer_reviews.text: Pro The cuts where good, nice packaging. Cons Doesn't dampen anything. Maybe a 24 pack or larger. 12 is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Maybe i did it wrong
customer_reviews.text: Didnt drown out all sound, but then again i didnt cover the entire wall juat the window, walls very thin
customer_reviews.author: Orlando G.

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: A few of them had little chunks missing but i was able to position them well enough so that you can't see them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Nobach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: I got these as part of a gift for my parents for their anniversary because my dad is learning guitar and hearing seven nation army on repeat for hours through the wall is driving her nuts lol. This is a great price and my mum is super thankful! I told her to use command strips and those seemed to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, does as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and arrived undamaged. I would have preferred them to be denser but otherwise they work as advertised and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except that 3 tiles are a lighter color. When I opened the box I could immediately see the 3 lighter gray tiles. When they are up on the wall it isn't noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Gorle

customer_reviews.title: Good for absorbing sounds
customer_reviews.text: I love the look it gives off to my walls and it also reduces the noise carried to other rooms. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Craig

customer_reviews.title: Tough to install and make look right.
customer_reviews.text: Not square.. Its hard to lay out a wall when the items ARE CUT WRONG. By the time you are done, pushing and pulling the foam to fit next to each other, the best you can have is a crappy looking project.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: A simple solution to speaker cabinet echo cancellation.
customer_reviews.text: A simple solution to speaker cabinet echo cancellation. Stapled in and makes a big difference when absorbing machine hum.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Buck Jr.

customer_reviews.title: They did the job. I wish they were a ...
customer_reviews.text: They did the job. I wish they were a little more dense but for the price you cant complain. Definitely made a difference in my little home studio.
customer_reviews.author: peter w

customer_reviews.title: Work decent
customer_reviews.text: They probably look better than they work but it is noticeable. Just don’t expect awesome dampening.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Daddy!

customer_reviews.title: could be the adhesive but the product is good. Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get to stay on the wall, could be the adhesive but the product is good. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: ChillC

customer_reviews.title: Not so good as I think it is going to work
customer_reviews.text: Not so good as I think it is going to work and also a little delicated.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime López

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Its really too thin to do anything other than used for packing foam. I would normally say you get what you pay for but in this case you get far less than what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Spbcorgan

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: The quality is ok some cuts are a bit uneven but I dnt mind them
customer_reviews.author: alejandro lara

customer_reviews.title: The picture makes it look like a solid rubber but it is actually a spongy foam.
customer_reviews.text: We used these to soundproof a very large box that my wife used as a sound booth for her voice recordings. They did the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Justice

customer_reviews.title: Made my home studio sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Installed in my piano studio and have definitely noticed improvement in the room acoustics. Reading through some of these other comments I will say they are not meant for soundproofing a room. If you’re looking to improve room acoustics or treating a room used for sound recording, these should do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tpappyj1

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to improve the acoustics in my home ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to improve the acoustics in my home office, and they absolutely get the job done. My apartment is on a relatively busy street, and the panels now dampen the outside noise from coming in. I asked for feedback from coworkers I'm frequently on conference calls with, and they say they no longer hear background noise and that I sound less echo-y.
customer_reviews.author: mlanigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: The tiles came in six pairs with each square the exact same size. I bought similar products from different vendors and this by far has the best quality. I stapled a couple in the corners of my studio to make a surrogate bass trap, which is great for playing acoustic guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I decided to use these for a room where I play a lot of music, and out of respect for the other people in my home, wanted to keep the noise level to a minimum. It's not completely sound proof, but I'd say I got my money's worth and then some. Thinking about gifting a set to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Note that some pieces are a little bit uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Viacheslav

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think they work well? no complaints from nose so far
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Used command strips to hang them to the wall and they worked perfectly. Reduces residual sound and dampens outside noise well.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: I've tried several of the other products at this price point and this one is by far the best! It's thicker than the others and is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than others! I've tried several of the other products at this price point and this one is by far the best! It's thicker than the others and is easy to hang up! I'm using these for my home office and plan on buying more!
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product completes our band room!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Easy to get on the wall (used command strips) and they look great! These helped to dampen some of the higher frequency reverb on the wall behind me. I'm putting the rest up (only 8 shown--need more command strips) but am planning on getting some for the other walls
customer_reviews.author: PJ Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your Man Cave!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly cut and uniform sizing. These foam tiles are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected Box for shipping could have been a little more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy, dimensionally inconsistent.
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent purchase and I hung them with command strips. I had to reposition them and the command strips came off the wall and the foam just fine. I will say that these are not dimensionally consistent. The edges are also out of square by about 3/16" on the bunch that I received. I squished them together on the wall to make up the gaps, but that was frustrating. I was hoping that they were 12" square, with right angles. All in all, I still was able to make them work on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Thanks dudes
customer_reviews.text: I don’t necessarily use this for studio work, I use it on my door because the only thing that’s not sound proof in my room and it works really well; 12 pack didn’t even fill up my whole door and I still can tell a big differences
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I have a cat that scratches at my door periodically ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that scratches at my door periodically throughout the night while I'm trying to sleep. I backed my bedroom door with these panels and the sound dampening effect has been dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy these are back in stock. They’re way better than the others I had to order. I use them for my home office to reduce background noise and these are the thickest panels at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: mary s vincent

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in an attempt to block out sound from living in the city. Instead, they proved only effective at blocking out light, not sound.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis_VA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for recording vocals. Helped me eliminate the annoying pops and cracks from my claymation voice-overs. Works great for my non-Hollywood budget! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Keeley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: placed on top of cabinets to reduce echo in living room/kitchen
customer_reviews.author: DKS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and loved it so much, I ordered another 12 tiles. Would strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: work well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my home office since I work remotely. I used command strips to put them up and I haven't had any problems yet. 5 stars - but I do wish they came in more colors
customer_reviews.author: DFouch

customer_reviews.title: they are not perfect squares, the length and width differ between 0
customer_reviews.text: 3 Stars, I bought 2 packages, they are not perfect squares, the length and width differ between 0.5 cm and 1 cm, so if you want to place them all together like in the picture you will have to deal with that, because they won't match perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the product didn't reduce any noice
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the product didn't reduce any noice ! And had a lot of small holes not sure why!
customer_reviews.author: Zulema

customer_reviews.title: Shipped quickly and the foam panels were thicker than expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and the foam panels were thicker than expected. I’m going to need more to cover the rest of the walls, but these were exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Acoustic Foam Panels! They worked better than I had planned for my in home music studio and at the price, I couldn't be happier! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: will cianfarani

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home-Offices
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, especially for the price. Easy to install and keeps the room very quiet. Would suggest if you have a home office space like I do to help keep you focused.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: lightweight and adequate for all types of surface coverage. Very adaptable.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Order!!!
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived super quick and super perfect! No issues at all.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Order for my music room and my office. Does a great job in the music room containing the sound and in the office so I don’t wake my baby!

customer_reviews.title: As promised and a great value. Timely delivery and they work as anticipated
customer_reviews.text: As promised and a great value. Timely delivery and they work as anticipated.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Foam is light weight and thicker than I expected. Very easy to install. It was just what I needed without having to spend too much!

customer_reviews.title: high quality at a great price point and should work great for our little ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this, high quality at a great price point and should work great for our little home theater project

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 packs of these. They were all very consistent in size and color and look and feel great. Can't wait to hang them up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality-wise they were lacking a little bit. Not all ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality-wise they were lacking a little bit. Not all of them were the same size and some weren't completely square.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Lord

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These panels are great. Helps keep noise out from the outside and looks cool on the wall. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for home recording
customer_reviews.text: they won't turn your basement into Symphony hall, but they definitely help reduce the garage recording vibe. Good purchase for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good, But you need a lot to red of echo 100%.

customer_reviews.title: Not as much noise reduction as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Not as much noise reduction as I had hoped, but it did absorb some noise. I don't have any way of scientifically measuring the noise reduction, but even with doubled layers, it only reduced the perceived noise level by about 25%. I was trying to quiet the fan hum from a surveillance system DVR, so I surrounded the DVR by these panels. I would have gotten better results by just putting the DVR in a cabinet with a door.
customer_reviews.author: Alan RC

customer_reviews.title: High quality, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: High quality, reasonable price. Enjoyed the infographic sent out after purchasing as well. Will be back for more
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Argires

customer_reviews.title: ... product it came faster than expected but overall I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this product it came faster than expected but overall I'm happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are super easy to install and they’re way more dense than the other ones I have!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Ordered two packs for my room and they’re super easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Rick N.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described. Seems to be good quality. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squares would be great it they adhere to something
customer_reviews.text: Tiles are very light weight (good thing), but I have found no mounting media that the tiles stick to. I have tried 1 "mounting squares, 1.5" mounting squares, half inch mounting tape, 1" mounting tape and at present trying 6" strips on Velcro. Velcro works the best but even its glue does not stick to the squares 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonmageds

customer_reviews.title: granted my husband's office is on the third floor (finished attic) where it's generally pretty warm, but the panels didn't stay up for ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my husband's office and they are working out perfectly. My only suggestion is to not buy the 3M hanging strips; granted my husband's office is on the third floor (finished attic) where it's generally pretty warm, but the panels didn't stay up for more than a few minutes. We ended up attaching them to the wall using foam board caulk.
customer_reviews.author: St3ll3r

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home office in San Francisco!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and work very well. Super dense material. I use them for my home office on a busy street in San Francisco and they do the trick. Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and I am happy to report that ...
customer_reviews.text: These panels have definitely exceeded my expectations! Great quality, and I am happy to report that they look great and once installed make the walls look clean and professional, but also do an excellent job of helping us control the sound at a wide range of frequencies in our studio. Will definitely plan on ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Al H

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. They actually buffer sound really well and look really cool and professional.Probably going to buy more. Fast shipping obvi.. amazon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this is just regular foam not acoustic foam.for this cheap quality the cost is too expensive.
